name: Leadership
samplePrompt: Draft a leadership memo that aligns teams around the selected context.

chunks.title: North Star
chunks.body: Customer trust and long-term value creation guide all decisions.

chunks.title: Operating Cadence
chunks.body: Weekly checkpoints, monthly reviews, quarterly strategy updates.

chunks.title: Decision-Making
chunks.body: Directly Responsible Individuals (DRIs), brief RFCs, documented rationale.

chunks.title: Risk Principles
chunks.body: Bias to small reversible bets; invest heavily in guardrails.
